H0.text: An organism is what the Sun is classified as.

H1.text: A decomposer is the classification of the Sun.

H2.text: A star is the classification of the Sun.

H3.text: A planet is the classification of the Sun.

A4.text: The Sun is a main-sequence G2V yellow dwarf of intermediate temperature and ordinary size.

A5.text: A star is a luminous spheroid of plasma held together by self-gravity.
